articles.title: Carlo Ancelotti responds to claims he could leave Real Madrid to become Brazil manager - The Mirror
articles.description: Real Madrid boss Carlo Ancelotti is one of the frontrunners to replace Tite as Brazil head coach after he left his role following the Selecao's disappointing quarter-final exit at the World Cup
articles.content:
Carlo Ancelotti has played down the chances of leaving Real Madrid to take over as head coach of Brazil.
